ja474:2.2: Khaṇaṃ muhuttañca mante na passaṃ → khaṇaṃ muhuttaṃ na maṃ tosayanti (bj, pts-vp-pli1)
ja474:3.3: Sayaṃ harī → athāharī (bj); athāhari (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
ja474:4.1: pure hi → pura'ssa (bj, pts-vp-pli1); purepi (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja474:5.4: atthaṃ → mā taṃ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1) | vijaheyya manto → vijaheyyu mantā (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja474:10.6: punappadāhi → punappasīda (bj, pts-vp-pli1); puna sampadāhi (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja474:11.2: Tuvampi dhammena → tvampi dhammeneva (mr) | pariggahesi → paṭiggahesi (bj, pts-vp-pli1)
ja474:12.3: Kiñcāpi laddhā jīvituṃ appapañño → kicchā laddhā jīvikaṃ appapañño (bj); kicchā laddhaṃ jīvitaṃ appapañño (sya1ed, sya2ed); kicchāpi laddhā jīvikaṃ appañña (pts-vp-pli1)
